name: addRecoveryAddress[success] add recovery address to account signer
addRecoveryAddress[success] add recovery address to sub-account signer
addRecoveryAddress[success] add recovery address to signer in both account and sub-account
addRecoveryAddress[success] add 2 different recovery addresses
addRecoveryAddress[success] add the same recovery address to 2 different signers
recoverAddress[error] add a signer to its own recovery addresses

steps.ret: cannot add self to recovery addresses

name: addRecoveryAddress[error] add recovery address to non-existent account signer
addRecoveryAddress[error] add existing recovery address
addRecoveryAddress[error] add recovery address to non-signer
removeRecoveryAddress[success] remove recovery address from account signer
addRecoveryAddress[success] remove recovery address from sub-account signer
addRecoveryAddress[success] remove recovery address from signer in both account and sub-account
removeRecoveryAddress[error] remove recovery address from non-existent account
removeRecoveryAddress[error] remove non-existent recovery address
addRecoveryAddress[error] remove existing recovery address from non-signer
recoverAddress[success] recover wallet(signed by recovery address)
recoverAddress[success] recover wallet(signed by old signer)
addRecoveryAddress[success] new signer inherits recovery address from old signer on recovery
recoverAddress[error] recover address to account signer
recoverAddress[error] recover address to sub-account signer
recoverAddress[error] recover wallet(valid signature by invalid signer)
addRecoveryAddress[error] add recovery address(no signature)

steps.ret: eip712 invalid signature: invalid signature length or v value

name: addRecoveryAddress[error] add recovery address(tampered signer)
addRecoveryAddress[error] add recovery address(tampered R)
addRecoveryAddress[error] add recovery address(tampered S)
addRecoveryAddress[error] add recovery address(tampered V)
addRecoveryAddress[error] add recovery address(tampered nonce)
addRecoveryAddress[error] add recovery address(expired signature)
removeRecoveryAddress[error] remove recovery address(no signature)

steps.ret: eip712 invalid signature: invalid signature length or v value

name: removeRecoveryAddress[error] remove recovery address(tampered signer)
removeRecoveryAddress[error] remove recovery address(tampered R)
removeRecoveryAddress[error] remove recovery address(tampered S)
removeRecoveryAddress[error] remove recovery address(tampered V)
removeRecoveryAddress[error] remove recovery address(tampered nonce)
removeRecoveryAddress[error] remove recovery address(expired signature)
recoverAddress[error] recover wallet(signed by recovery address)(no signature)

steps.ret: eip712 invalid signature: invalid signature length or v value

name: recoverAddress[error] recover wallet(signed by recovery address)(tampered signer)
recoverAddress[error] recover wallet(signed by recovery address)(tampered R)
recoverAddress[error] recover wallet(signed by recovery address)(tampered S)
recoverAddress[error] recover wallet(signed by recovery address)(tampered V)
recoverAddress[error] recover wallet(signed by recovery address)(tampered nonce)
recoverAddress[error] recover wallet(signed by recovery address)(expired signature)
recoverAddress[error] recover wallet(signed by old signer)(no signature)

steps.ret: eip712 invalid signature: invalid signature length or v value

name: recoverAddress[error] recover wallet(signed by old signer)(tampered signer)
recoverAddress[error] recover wallet(signed by old signer)(tampered R)
recoverAddress[error] recover wallet(signed by old signer)(tampered S)
recoverAddress[error] recover wallet(signed by old signer)(tampered V)
recoverAddress[error] recover wallet(signed by old signer)(tampered nonce)
